text: Ole Borch (1626 â€“ 1690) (latinized to Olaus Borrichius or Olaus Borrichus) was a Danish scientist, physician, grammarian, and poet, most well-known today for being the teacher at the Vor Frue Skole in Copenhagen of Nicholas Steno. ==References== Category:1626 births Category:1690 deaths Category:Danish physicians
title: Ole Borch
